channel.title: BillyOh - Creating an Ideal Garden Lifestyle for You
channel.description: BillyOh - Creating an Ideal Garden Lifestyle for You

item.title: User Experience Is More Than A Single User InterfaceLink
item.description:
User Experience Is More Than A Single User InterfaceLink

I am a user experience designer. But you wouldn’t recognize me as one. I don’t often use Photoshop, Skitch or any other graphics package. You will rarely find me designing hero banners or carousels. I don’t even find myself wireframing much these days. Even so, I do design the experiences of users.

item.title: Getting Started on The Grid
item.description:
Getting Started on The Grid

Creating a Site

Welcome to The Grid Beta, we’re excited to have you onboard! Here are a few quick tips to get you up and running.
